body:
And feature docs: https://help.github.com/articles/helping-people-contribute-to-your-project/

To do:

- Add `ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md` which lists the sections for an issue
- Add `PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` which advises the user not to file a PR and to use Gerrit instead instead (it could contain similar text to #9220)
- Think about whether to move some or all of `CONTRIBUTING.md`, `ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md`, and `PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` into a top-level `.github/` directory. These files are github-specific so maybe it would be nice to hide them. On the other hand, I know how @robpike et al feel about dot files :)
